function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Linking built environment and natural environment with chronic and infectious disease (COVID-19) pandemics","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the relationship between environment and disease propagation","Mitigation":"Further research and data collection to validate the conceptual model","Technologies":"Integrated county-level data analysis, simulation-assisted path analysis","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Obesity mediating the relationship between the built and natural environment and COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Lack of mitigation strategies targeting obesity and its impact on COVID-19 mortality","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted obesity prevention programs and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Health education, community health interventions","People":"Healthcare professionals, individuals at risk of obesity and COVID-19","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Differences in built environment relationships with obesity and COVID-19 across income and ethnicity","Impact":"Increased disparities in obesity and COVID-19 mortality rates among vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Equitable access to built and natural environments, targeted healthcare interventions","Technologies":"Urban design planning, community development initiatives","People":"Low-income and minority communities, advocacy groups","Owner":"Urban planners, community development organizations"}]}
